title: Jab Mila Tu
content:
Jab Mila Tu (transl. When I Met You) is an Indian Hindi-language drama television series directed by Lalit Mohan and written by Harneet Singh.[1] Produced under A Two Nice Men Mediaworks Production,[2] it stars Mohsin Khan,[3] Eisha Singh,[4] Pratik Sehajpal[5] and Alisha Chopra.[6] The series aired on JioCinema from 22 January 2024 to 26 February 2024.[7]

The series was announced on JioCinema.[9] Principal photography of the series wrapped in December 2023.[10] The teaser of the series was released on 9 January 2024.[11] Subsequently, the official trailer was released on 16 January 2024.[12]

A critic writing for Times Now gave the series 2+1⁄2 out of 5 stars.[15] Arpita Mondal of Midgard Times awarded the series six-and-a-half out of ten stars.[16]
Aakash Kumar of Filmibeat said "Pratik Sehajpal Steals Hearts As Jigar In His New Show."[17]
